title: [RANKED] Black screen attempting queue
body: starting this morning i just wanted to play some ranked games and it kept showing a black screen when ever i tried.  And i relogged in like 3 times someone please help i can use your guidance :D

replies.body: Black screens like this usually indicate a network problem failing to maintain a connection and download assets.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved for good.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i just had a bugsplat before, but what you mean is to unplug and replug the router correct ?

It's important to go through each step of the connection guide, not just a few, to make sure that all possibilities are ruled out.  If you are receiving a bugsplat error, then there may be a lingering problem with your drivers or hardware.  I suggest also going through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this!
Thank you so much you really helped me out ! :D hope you have a great day <3
